## Services

### Airport Transfer
Safe and comfortable transportation from Almaty International Airport (ALA) to your hotel. Fixed rates, no hidden fees, available 24/7.

### Guided Day Tours
Full-day private trips to top destinations near Almaty:
- **Charyn Canyon** — Kazakhstan's "Grand Canyon," a stunning 150km deep gorge
- **Kolsay Lakes** — Three pristine alpine lakes in the Tien Shan mountains
- **Big Almaty Lake** — A turquoise mountain lake at 2,511m altitude
- **Medeu & Shymbulak** — The world's highest skating rink and ski resort
- **Kok Tobe** — Hilltop park with panoramic city views and cable car
- **Almaty City Tour** — Historic sites, parks, museums, and local markets

All tours include comfortable round-trip transport and an English-speaking guide.

### Authentic Food Tour
Taste real Kazakh cuisine at the best local spots in Almaty. Dishes include beshbarmak, lagman, plov, manty, baursak, and kumys. VIP option available: a home-cooked meal prepared by a local Kazakh family.
